aradka Nabu-bel-šumati ana dinān šarri bēlīya lullik ummā ana šarri bēlīyāma mār šiprīya ana šulmi šarri sīsê u ṣābē altapra ana Dur-Šarrukki al-x x x x x x x x x+x x x x x x x x x x x x yaʾānu {1}{d}a-num-x x x x x x x Ruʾua ālik pāni x x x x x x x x illikūni x x x x x x x x-na ma-al-x x x x x x x x-ga-a-ti x+x x x x x x x x id-di-i x+x x x x x x x x pān šarri kî x x x x x x x x-ab umma minamma x x x x x x-an-na-a-ši x x x x x x x x x aššu ra-x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x
